name: Conductor (itch)
description:
Conductor

A point-and-click adventure story about the different forms of love.

You're a train conductor. At least, you usually are. You're on the train for someone, but as you move from car to car, you meet other people who you can help.

A Game by Ariel Magnes, Camden Segal, Jake O'Brien, KG Tan & Shelley Lowe.

Music by Bettina Calmon, Charlie McCarron & Tomas Batista.

Made for Train Jam 2017.

(Note: The game is incomplete. We blame it on the gorgeous views of the U.S. landscape as our train chugged on from Chicago to San Francisco.)
